details.callToWorship: All Hail the Power of Jesus' Name #202
details.songOfResponse: Jesus, Keep Me Near the Cross #280

list: The 4th annual Chili Cook-Off is Sunday, February 09. Sign up to bring something in the foyer!
The Valentine Banquet is Wednesday, February 12 at 6:00 PM. The church will provide the meat; attendees will provide sides and desserts.
From Carol: We are making our last trip to Cuba to help supply our friends with medicine and money to buy pigs and chicken boxes to feed the church.
